responsibilities: Employing persuasive design elements on the landing pages for desktop and mobile, achieving a 15% boost in conversion rates.
Worked closely with product owners, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to deliver front-end solutions that met product requirements, business goals, and user needs.
Leading and coached junior engineers, promoting a culture of collaboration with Agile methodology, continuous learning, and best practices, resulting in a 20% increase in team productivity.
Learning and performing A/B testing to validate hypotheses and enhance user experiences, leading to a 10% growth in customer engagement and retention.
Encourage clean and maintainable code, responsible for reviews and continuous integration practices, reducing code defects by 15% and improving overall code quality.
Engaging in the full development life cycle including architectural design and testing.
Optimized website performance, consistently achieving top-notch Lighthouse scores, ensuring optimal loading times and superior SEO rankings.
Responsible for unit testing, feature prioritization, and managed pull and merge requests.
Acting as the primary point of contact for clients, collaborating closely to understand project requirements and deliver tailored solutions.

Learning through engaging in regular discussions with the design team and back-end engineers, conceptualizing and implementing new features and enhancements, resulting in cutting-edge web applications.
Implemented user interface and experience designs for prominent brands and integrating design concepts with cutting-edge front-end technologies, enhancing user experiences and customer engagement.

Optimized server-side rendering, improving search engine rankings and website visibility, achieving a 15% increase in organic traffic and user acquisition and 15% client-side performance improvements.
Created flawless UI components and collaborated with UX designers to enhance user satisfaction and retention, earning positive user feedback.
Collaborated with the back-end team to design and optimize RESTful APIs, enhancing application performance and data handling, enabling faster data retrieval and seamless user interactions.
Learned to troubleshot and resolved frontend-related issues promptly, ensuring smooth multi-device and cross-browser compatibility.
Built highly effective and responsive landing pages for desktop and mobile, achieving a 20% boost in conversion rates and user engagement.
Produced compelling graphic and media materials using Adobe applications, enhancing the visual appeal and aesthetics of web pages.
Led the front-end development of projects, using action scripting, XML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience.
Outlined the structural content of websites, optimizing user navigation and information flow, while managing image editing and graphics creation.
Understand and implemented accessibility practices, ensuring compliance with WCAG guidelines, and providing an inclusive and user-friendly experience.

portfolio.description: Hyperides is a car shop located in Ortigas Philippines. From imported exotic cars to sporty to V.I.P. cars, whether you're shopping for a new, certified or used car, you can find it here.

portfolio.title: Media Design
portfolio.description: Media Design also known as MeDesign is a printing company located in Mandaluyong Philippines. They specialized in banners, business cards, calling cards, postcards, brochures, leaflets, flyers, stationery, posters, booklets, and tarpaulin printing.

portfolio.title: Mobitrans
portfolio.description: From m-learning to mobile gaming, Mobitrans is the global leader in value-added services for mobile devices. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in the vibrant city of Dubai, Mobitrans employs over 50 multinational experts in the digital media industry. In partnership with over 120 mobile operators and advertisers worldwide, we have expanded our award-winning portfolio into 42 countries, and are live on every continent.

portfolio.title: Babelbay
portfolio.description: Babel Bay is a premium language learning service. Our service contains interactive courses on some of the world's most popular languages. They are perfect for beginners, travelers, or anyone who wants to improve their foreign language vocabulary.

portfolio.title: MAcademy
portfolio.description: MAcademy is the world’s number one mobile learning service where you can learn when and where you want. All MAcademy courses are developed based on the Interpolated Memory Test Methodology (IMTM), which according to Harvard studies by Karl K. Szpunar reduces mind wandering and improves learning online lectures.

portfolio.title: Mobile Academy
portfolio.description: Mobile Academy is one of the top m-learning services in the world that puts the ‘smart’ in your smartphone. Our award-winning service is packed with stimulating and interactive courses on a variety of subjects ranging from personal to professional development. These mobile-optimized courses are designed to ensure that your learning experience is fun and effective.

portfolio.title: VIP Games

portfolio.title: GAP
portfolio.description: GAP is an American worldwide clothing and accessories retailer. GAP was founded in 1969 by Donald Fisher and Doris F. Fisher and is headquartered in San Francisco, California. The company operates six primary divisions: Gap (the namesake banner), Banana Republic, Old Navy, Intermix, Hill City, and Athleta.

portfolio.title: Mamas & Papas
portfolio.description: Mamas & Papas is a UK-based nursery brand and manufacturer supplying prams, pushchairs, baby products, furniture, and maternity wear. It was established in Huddersfield in 1981 by David and Luisa Scacchetti, both of Italian ancestry, whose initial aim was to bring Italian design to the UK baby buggy market.

portfolio.title: Nisnass
portfolio.description: Nisnass isn't just a brand, it's a community - an app where you will find something for everyone: trendy styles for the fashion-savvy, comfortable basics for the minimalists, fun outfits for the kids with imagination, and tasteful touches to amp up your home décor, all at your fingertips.

portfolio.title: Ounass
portfolio.description: Ounass, the definitive home of luxury, is the Middle East’s first premier luxury website offering the world’s most exclusive brands in an editorial environment that is globally relevant but locally-led. The dual-language website offers a curated selection of women’s ready-to-wear, footwear, handbags, fine jewelry, cosmetics, and home merchandise, with many exclusive items found only on Ounass.com.

portfolio.title: Spinneys
portfolio.description: Spinneys is a multinational supermarket chain active in the United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Lebanon, Oman and Pakistan. It began as a railway provision merchant company, and expanded to a grocery firm importing British Empire goods to Mandate Palestine.

portfolio.title: Choithrams
portfolio.description: Choithram and Sons was established in 1944 in Sierra Leone, West Africa. Since then, it has developed into an international company spanning Europe, North America, Africa as well as the Gulf. The company is a private business that also funds and manages a group of schools and hospitals in India and West Africa.

portfolio.title: Waitrose & Partners
portfolio.description: Waitrose & Partners is a brand of British supermarkets, founded in 1904 as Waite, Rose & Taylor, later shortened to Waitrose. They also aims to provide the best quality food sourced in the most responsible way. It was acquired in 1937 by employee-owned retailer John Lewis Partnership, which still sells groceries under the brand.

portfolio.title: Ahmed Seddiqi & Sons
portfolio.description: Recognized today as a pioneer among leading retailers in the Gulf, Ahmed Seddiqi & Sons represents more than 60 luxury timepieces and jewellery brands across 51 destinations in the United Arab Emirates. What started as one man's passion over 60 years ago is today an empire that brings luxury and honesty to the hearts of watch collectors all over the world.

portfolio.title: Wlth
portfolio.description: Wlth aims to revolutionise financial services in Australia. With Wlth proprietry state-of-the-art technology platform, they will endeavour to actually help other banks, fintechs and corporates in the future to unlock the potential capabilities of our platform to assist their customers.

portfolio.title: CoreFit
portfolio.description: CoreFit connect an expansive health-orientated community to a multitude of services within the wellbeing, sports and fitness industry. Their sleek, web-based mobile application houses personal trainers, facilities, nutrition providers and more to enable people to live happy, healthy lives.

portfolio.title: Project bYouty
portfolio.description: Project bYouty is the conscious online destination for women (and men) in the Middle East. It’s not just about skincare and selfcare, it’s way more than that. Project bYouty is on a journey of self-discovery with you: spiritually, emotionally, and physically.

portfolio.title: Glu
portfolio.description: Glu provides workable solutions to issues encountered, when pushing for the best learning outcomes for students. Students - improve your grades with tailor-made online support. Parents - support your children and help them achieve. Find a teacher with the expertise you need, and much more.
